OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD COMMUNITY ACCESS AND INTERPRETING SERVICE (SCAIS)

Desc.entry: Aims to develop and provide a quality 24 hour centralised interpreting service to the users of health and other related services, whose first language is not English. Organises training for staff "Working Through Interpreters: Best Practice". Provides a telephone based interpreting service to compliment the face-to-face service and offer competitive rates for document translation.
